name: Makarov PMM magazine
description: The standard magazine for the Modernized Makarov pistol, holds 10 rounds.

name: Extended Makarov PMM magazine
description: A slightly extended version of the magazine for the Modernized Makarov pistol, holds 12 rounds.

name: Vz. 82 magazine
description: The standard magazine for the Vz.82 pistol, holds 12 rounds.

name: Fort-12 magazine
description: The standard magazine for the Fort-12, holds 12 rounds.

name: APS magazine
description: The standard magazine for the Stechkin APS, holds 20 rounds.

name: Kedr 20-round magazine
description: A 20-round magazine for the PP-91 Kedr.

name: Bizon magazine
description: A 64-round helical-feed cylinder magazine for the PP-19 Bizon.
